Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can use Alexa to control Comfort+ Smarthome devices! The skill function contains: turn on/off, change working mode, set temperature and query temperature.
Users can wakes up the speaker by 'Alexa, turn on air conditioner' to power on their Air conditioner when they are relaxing on the sofa.
Users must do Account Linking following the steps below:
1.In Amazon Alexa app,search the 'Comfort+' skill, and click the ENABLE button, then enter the registered Comfort+ APP account.
2. If you don't have an Comfort+ APP account, please download the App from App Store or Google Play Store and register an account.
3.In Comfort+ APP, make sure you added an air conditioner.
4.Back to the Account Linking interface of Alexa APP, enter the registered Comfort+ account to complete Account Linking.
